Maxwell Labs | Amsterdam, The Netherlands | Frontend, Backend and more | Onsite | Full-time | Visa | https://maxwell.ai

Maxwell is building the leading conversational commerce platform. Our customers include Takeaway.com, Hellofresh, Catawiki and Heineken. They use our tools to instantly reach & engage customers through chat apps. We think of ourselves as the Sendgrid for today’s preferred ways of customer communication: instant, asynchronous and 24/7 availability.

After completing a seed funding round, we are now looking for developers to join us in creating the next generation of customer communication tools. You’ll be working with an international team of four experienced software developers and a commercial founder. Our team’s experience includes Yahoo, Hellofresh, Tom Tom, Salsify and The Cloakroom. Our beautiful office in Amsterdam is located on the Herengracht in the center of Amsterdam. We have experience with arranging work permits and are open to applications worldwide.

Tech stack: Python 3.7, AMQP, MongoDB, React, Redux, Docker, Bitbucket Pipelines

Frontend: https://angel.co/maxwell-ai/jobs/287296-senior-frontend-deve...

Backend: https://angel.co/maxwell-ai/jobs/269372-senior-software-deve...

We are also hiring for other positions (design, machine learning, UI): https://angel.co/maxwell-ai/jobs

Questions? Want to apply? Talk directly with our founder and mention that you came across this position on Hacker News: asbjorn.jorgensen@maxwell.ai
